column5: Has any one here had any experience with the Lowrance line of radios? I am pretty close to replacing my current radio and I am seriously looking at the Lowrance line.
Love 'em. I have the older LVR-850, great radio. Icefisherman has the newer LVR-250, it's even better. -Brian
I hear they're good - just picked up a 250...so, I hope they're good!  :-)
Thanks guys, I was looking at the LVR 250 yesterday at Angling Outfitters and Jos told me I could have it for a good deal. I think that will be next weeks new toy.
